title: Secret Neighbor  Direct Link
description:
Secret Neighbor is a multiplayer Social Horror game set in the Hello Neighbor universe . Explore the Hello Neighbor house with your friends, but beware one of you is the Neighbor in disguise. Use teamwork and rescue your friend from the basement, or mess with everyoneâ€™s heads as the Neighbor Your group has one goal sneak around the house, collecting the keys in order to unlock the basement door. The only problem is one of you is the Neighbor, a traitor in disguise.
Stop the intruders Use your disguise to gain their trust, set up traps, and dispose of those pesky intruders one by one. Convince your friends someone else is the Neighbor and let the witch hunt begin. Your secret must remain safe Experienced enough to navigate the official maps with your eyes closed? Jump into the Level Editor and build your own maze , then invite your friends over to play For a full guide on how to play the game, please check out our YouTube playlist with Secret Neighbor guides.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 3.0 GHz, AMD FX-8300 3.3 GHz
